_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The progressive meditative attainments [: The dimension of neither perception nor non-perception
The cessation of perception and feeling
The reasons for not being eager for the: Haven't seen the drawbacks of the current meditative attainment
Haven't cultivated the current meditative attainment
Haven't realized the benefits of the next meditative attainment
Haven't developed the next meditative attainment
The afflictions experienced during medit: Perceptions and attentions accompanied by the dimension of infinite space
Perceptions and attentions accompanied by the dimension of infinite consciousness
Perceptions and attentions accompanied by the dimension of nothingness
The announcement of supreme perfect awak: Entered into and withdrawn from the nine progressive meditative attainments in both forward and reverse order
Announced supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
